column2: UPDATE 4-GM to make next-generation Chevrolet Cruze in Mexico MEXICO CITY/DETROIT
column3: March 23 General Motors Co  will build its next-generation Chevrolet Cruze compact in Mexico
column5: as automakers look to expand in the Latin American nation to take advantage of low labor costs and free trade agreements.

column2: HP partners with Bang & Olufsen for sound technology March 24 Hewlett-Packard Co said it had entered into a partnership to equip its PCs
column3: tablets and other gadgets with audio technology from Danish television and sound system maker Bang & Olufsen.
